memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for a single array on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for the given array and checks for allocation failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T *&zs, T *&h, T *&u, T *&v)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for multiple arrays (zs, h, u, v) on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for the given arrays.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T *&zs, T *&h, T *&u, T *&v, T *&U, T *&hU)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for extended arrays (zs, h, u, v, U, hU) on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for the given arrays.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, GradientsP< T > &Grad)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for gradient arrays on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for all gradient arrays in GradientsP structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, EvolvingP< T > &Ev)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for evolving variables on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for h, zs, u, v arrays in EvolvingP structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, EvolvingP_M< T > &Ev)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory for extended evolving variables on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for h, zs, u, v, U, hU arrays in EvolvingP_M structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, Param XParam, Model< T > &XModel)
memberdef.name: AllocateCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate all model arrays on the CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates memory for all arrays in the Model structure, including blocks, gradients, fluxes, and output buffers.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate memory for a single array.

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for the given array to match the new block and size.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, T *&zs, T *&h, T *&u, T *&v)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate memory for multiple arrays (zs, h, u, v).

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for the given arrays to match the new block and size.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, T *&zs, T *&h, T *&u, T *&v, T *&U, T *&hU)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate memory for extended arrays (zs, h, u, v, U, hU).

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for the given arrays to match the new block and size.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, EvolvingP< T > &Ev)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate memory for evolving variables structure.

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for all arrays in EvolvingP structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, EvolvingP_M< T > &Ev)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate memory for extended evolving variables structure.

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for all arrays in EvolvingP_M structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, Param XParam, Model< T > &XModel)
memberdef.name: ReallocArray

briefdescription.para: Reallocate all model arrays.

detaileddescription.para: Reallocates memory for all arrays in the Model structure, including blocks, gradients, fluxes, and output buffers.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, int gpudevice, T *&z)
memberdef.name: AllocateMappedMemCPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate mapped memory on the CPU for CUDA interop.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates pinned or mapped memory for CUDA host-device interoperation.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T fillval, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: FillCPU

briefdescription.para: Fill a CPU array with a specified value.

detaileddescription.para: Sets all elements of the array to the given fill value.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, int i, int j, int ib)
memberdef.name: memloc

briefdescription.para: Compute memory index for a cell in a block (using Param).

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the linear memory index for a cell in a block using model parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (int halowidth, int blkmemwidth, int i, int j, int ib)
memberdef.name: memloc

briefdescription.para: Compute memory index for a cell in a block (using explicit sizes).

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the linear memory index for a cell in a block using explicit halo and block sizes.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nblk, int blksize, Param XParam, Model< T > &XModel)
memberdef.name: AllocateGPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate all model arrays on the GPU.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates device memory for all arrays in the Model structure, including blocks, gradients, fluxes, and output buffers.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T *&z_g)
memberdef.name: AllocateGPU

briefdescription.para: Allocate memory on the GPU for a single array.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates device memory for the given array.

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, int gpudevice, T *&z_g, T *z)
memberdef.name: AllocateMappedMemGPU

briefdescription.para: Get device pointer for mapped host memory.

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves the device pointer for host memory mapped for CUDA interop.
